title: What i dislike about the new HUD
body: To be honest i like the new HUD but there are something that i found is missing in the new HUD. The CS and KDA on the top right side of the map which i feel is important even though i can just press TAB if i want to see them. Even though it is just a button away to see the CS and KDA i still wish to see the CS and KDA on the top right of my screen.

replies.body: Your score being ontop of the minimap encourages people too look at the minimap, rather than 2 different places.
